title: WTF HOW DID I GET BANNED? (2 week ban)
body:
Don't get me wrong, League is a  fun game and all, but there are those people who deliberately ruin other peoples moods and decide to troll and int. I barely even said anything personal. I just ask my teamates why theyre feeding and all that and just tell them to stop. But it's scary bc things like that can get you reported and even banned... here are the chat logs

Game 1
Xeronator1: hey yasuo
Xeronator1: do you want to fight teemo
Xeronator1: ty
Xeronator1: i need lol
Xeronator1: can i red
Xeronator1: yea
Xeronator1: im reporting this yasuo
Xeronator1: ff if yall want?
Xeronator1: wtf
Xeronator1: are u serious
Xeronator1: 4 top
Xeronator1: god you bad viktor
Xeronator1: lol
Xeronator1: 4 top
Xeronator1: 40 more sec
Xeronator1: yea i pinged you to come.
Xeronator1: yall have 4 people
Xeronator1: lol
Xeronator1: you have 4 fed players
Xeronator1: that I didnt feed
Xeronator1: the yi int
Xeronator1: bronze yi
Xeronator1: says no and thinks we can win this
Xeronator1: unwinnable
Xeronator1: why are you people saying no
Xeronator1: zoe why would you say no
Xeronator1: like why
Xeronator1: why are you people wasting timw
Xeronator1: you guys are the reason why league is a toxic community
Xeronator1: troll 0-8 yi
Xeronator1: 1-5 zoe
Xeronator1: jesus
Xeronator1: and then yall still want to waste time
Xeronator1: vayne im on your side on this one
Xeronator1: i dont like this zoe at all
Xeronator1: report her too ok?
Xeronator1: you inted zoe
Xeronator1: ??
Xeronator1: report zoe for toxic
Xeronator1: and inting

Game 2
Xeronator1: lol mb
Xeronator1: the chat screen didnt work for me
Xeronator1: can i top?
Xeronator1: ???
Xeronator1: ??
Xeronator1: what an ass..
Xeronator1: my chat didnt work for some reason in champ select.
Xeronator1: aight reporting you then
Xeronator1: i legit dont like your personality
Xeronator1: so reported
Xeronator1: all good
Xeronator1: hey man
Xeronator1: i didnt ask for this
Xeronator1: lol dont come bot
Xeronator1: this isnt even my problem
Xeronator1: just the trist
Xeronator1: XD
Xeronator1: XD
Xeronator1: lol
Xeronator1: u wanted top u got top orn
Xeronator1: XD
Xeronator1: yes take the adc farm kayn
Xeronator1: i mean
Xeronator1: u are silver 4
Xeronator1: orn
Xeronator1: shitty rank
Xeronator1: im a support yasuo
Xeronator1: ?
Xeronator1: lol
Xeronator1: who gives a
Xeronator1: look at our orn
Xeronator1: 51 cs 13 minutes
Xeronator1: while they illaoi
Xeronator1: 104 cs in 1 3 min
Xeronator1: you saw me picked yasuo
Xeronator1: u still decide to go top
Xeronator1: with yo shit pick
Xeronator1: thats why u silver
Xeronator1: trist ur good ur plat 2
Xeronator1: its this orn
Xeronator1: lol
Xeronator1: makes me mad
Xeronator1: he couldved went ornn supp
Xeronator1: and i go yas top
Xeronator1: simple as that
Xeronator1: i guess greed get in the way
Xeronator1: lol look wgat happen now
Xeronator1: we lose
Xeronator1: bc orn decide to go top
Xeronator1: right??

replies.body: Ummmm because youre toxic, harassed your teammates accused them of inting threatened to report them, called them bad for their ranks, and have almost definetly been penalized before?  Just a thought.

Xeronator1: so reported

Xeronator1: what an ass..

Xeronator1: shitty rank
Xeronator1: im a support yasuo

looks to me like harassment. The punishment was just. 
u had punishments before, next punishment is a permaban.

last chance to cool down and reform.

wym? they started the argument... if you were to put yourself in perspective in the game. they said things like lol go bot noob. or "idgaf"... things like that. i dont go like that right off the bat man. dude. i didnt say anything bad to the player playing the game.

Nobody cares what they said.

And you did, you flamed and harassed all game.

Them starting it (in your opinion) is not an excuse to break the rules and throw the game.
It still would have been much simpler for everyone if you had muted them after the first offense.
look man. league is a team game. if people refuse to communicate, its like putting yourself in a situation where youre surrounded by a herd of sheeps while yorue the wolf
and the one where i said "Im a support yasuo". the orn took top from me and decided to go top and then told me to go support yasuo.
should have just muted and gone yasuo support and reported at the end of the game. Your account, your responsibilities fam.

1: Flame team repeatedly.

2: Get banned

3: Find someone else to blame.
I didnt say anything rude like "get cancer" or "go die"... come on.... I legit never would go that far...

That would not be rude, it would be completely intolerable and warrant a permanent ban. In the real world that sort of behavior leads to being fired from a job without any questions asked.

In fact, you acted extremely rudely, but you seem to have a warped schoolyard idea of what is acceptable behavior. Work on it.

Remember, you cant beat trolls by flaming, and it certainly wont improve their gameplay.

I'm actually sad about the whole situation... the trolls and the intentional feeders go away unharmed... and to mention they did say some mean nasty things about me. I'll totally reform from this. I'm just a bit irritated they didn't get the punishment that I'm having rn.

> [{quoted}](name=Xeronator1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-17T01:04:10.331+0000)
>
> I'm actually sad about the whole situation... the trolls and the intentional feeders go away unharmed... and to mention they did say some mean nasty things about me. I'll totally reform from this. I'm just a bit irritated they didn't get the punishment that I'm having rn.

They typically do, you only get a notification if they got punished by the automated system right after your report - if they got hammered later or by manual review, you never know.
and hopefully..
I mean I'm not a toxic person irl, it's just that situations like these... like competitive gaming and playing with trolls can get to me, and whenever I do rage, like I said, I don't ever go far.
I'm just scared that I'll get permabanned...

If you're scared of permaban, literally turn off every single instance of your chat for the next few months. Doesn't matter if you have something witty, if you wanna call out the Ornn, you mute and you don't. Regardless of if they were bad or toxic, you egged it on, becoming toxic in your own right. Common sense dictates if you're talking to a premade, you just don't do it since they outnumber you.  Yes, it hella sucks, and I have issues with it, but it really ain't worth losing your account (and money) over people in a stupid game.  I would have reported you myself. Being toxic doesn't just mean the instant ban phrases. If you make a game unenjoyable, or harder for your team in any way, you are considered toxic. If, as a keyboard warrior, you help your team lose by continually typing and they continually type to respond to you instead of playing the game, you're considered toxic. It's usually just best to mute and report. They'll eventually get theirs, and you get to keep playing without tilting worse.
Buddy, you may not have used inappropriate words but you have a very negative attitude, that is bannable.
I know, but the people in those games were mostly 4 mans. and 3-4 people reported me in those games alone...

> [{quoted}](name=Xeronator1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-12-17T01:20:26.564+0000)
>
> I know, but the people in those games were mostly 4 mans. and 3-4 people reported me in those games alone...

It's better to say nothing at all then to argue with people who arent that bright or are  intending to make you feel discouraged, the banning system doesn't have human emotions, therefore you should avoid saying anything thatll trigger it. People enjoy you reacting negativley, they know how to play you. So don't let them, if they do dumb things just let it be, they wont learn during the game. It's how it is

What can I do about these players... :/ this is the first time ive been 2 week banned. Hopefully I'm not horrible of a person for this. but those guys that I played with were hella negative... worse than me.

> [{quoted}](name=Xeronator1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-17T01:30:47.204+0000)
>
> What can I do about these players... :/ this is the first time ive been 2 week banned. Hopefully I'm not horrible of a person for this. but those guys that I played with were hella negative... worse than me.

So this is your first two week ban.... what about chat restrictions? Any previous chat restrictions?

> [{quoted}](name=Xeronator1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-12-17T01:20:26.564+0000)
>
> I know, but the people in those games were mostly 4 mans. and 3-4 people reported me in those games alone...

1 report is just as strong as 4. it doesn't matter how many people report you. and if you weren't so negative and requesting reports of teammates then they would've been tossed out probably. 

also did you have a chat restriction previously? if so then this is natural progression, if not then i would say the 14 day is a bit harsh.
You probably got banned because you were asking for reports, which you shouldn't do. Anyways this chat log looks very toxic, so just be happy you got a two week ban instead of a perma ban.

> [{quoted}](name=LordArryn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-17T00:54:00.266+0000)
>
> You probably got banned because you were asking for reports, which you shouldn't do. Anyways this chat log looks very toxic, so just be happy you got a two week ban instead of a perma ban.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/PzY1ArN3-we-dont-ban-people-for-asking-for-reports

Dude how am I  toxic. I'm just telling them to stop dying... and then they tell me to "stfu noob." the Zoe even said things to me like kys %%%got and all that during the 1st game. like wtf? I dont even go that far telling her that...
and now i get banned because of it...
i mean, im not trying to play victim, but it sucks that things like these can get you HEAVILY punished

Sorry bud, no one's gonna cut you any slack on here. I feel ya, this doesn't deserve a ban imo, but people on here are more interested in smiting toxic players than actually putting themselves in someone else's shoes. Send in a support ticket and see if riot will cut you some slack, but don't get your hopes up, the support staff is almost as bad as the people that frequent player behavior.

Xeronator1: 104 cs in 1 3 min
Xeronator1: you saw me picked yasuo
Xeronator1: u still decide to go top
Xeronator1: with yo shit pick
Xeronator1: thats why u silver

Non-stop flaming. I assume you recently had a 14 day ban as well (within the last 6 months)  which means you're on super thin ice.

> Non-stop flaming. I assume you recently had a 14 day ban as well (within the last 6 months)  which means you're on super thin ice.

This was like way back in December before Christmas. I regret what I said in the past and now learn from it. Setting myself an e xample now

Im sorry  I didnt check the date, not sure why it got necro'ed. lol

GOod for you, glad you improved your attitude! Keep up the good owrk.

Bro i got 3 acc banned in a week !?!? the furst was legit cuz i flamed ,im hones. the second got a 14 days ban after one game ..... Riot is mesed up.
BAN 2 ACC with no reason !? ok i go play DOTA or whatever. they gave me reason to leave league and dont come back .

> [{quoted}](name=warrior dude,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sENIxmmz,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-02-25T14:40:37.634+0000)
>
> Bro i got 3 acc banned in a week !?!? the furst was legit cuz i flamed ,im hones. the second got a 14 days ban after one game ..... Riot is mesed up.
> BAN 2 ACC with no reason !? ok i go play DOTA or whatever. they gave me reason to leave league and dont come back .

Yea when I look back at my toxic posts, I really want to reform more now. Need to set a good example for myself. That way my character will be good and I'll yet to find myself a gf eventually :)
aight im looking back to my mistakes and ill be reformed.
have fun getting permbanned u are so ignorant
how am i ignorant... ignorant that the trolls roam free?
yes, by acknowledging the troll you are giving them EXACTLY what they want. the only logical decision is to ignore them mute and move on.
that deserves no time ban. maybe chat restriction.that is if you are telling us the truth
i am.  those are the chat logs that youre seeing rn

and whenever I do rage. games like these are usually how I rage when I'm at my worst. Nothing like "end your life", or "it would be better if you hang yourself" or "you shouldved been aborted" or "you have no friends and no one loves you"... trust me. ive seen worse and these people often go away unharmed. but yes, I will try my best to reform

the first game. i had a toxic zoe and a troll yi who inted the entire game. they were trolling and inting and all i did was tell them to stop and wanted to ff... i did ok in the game but they were non stop just trolling and then all of them decided to report me bc of it. unlucky.

2nd game, their team was a 4 man and I called top before this orn did. orn takes top, goes in and proceeds to feed. i was forced to play yas bot and when i lost they blamed me for the loss and sadly, all 4 of them reported me and i got banned as a result.

look, im not that toxic. its just that i get so misunderstood by other players that they force their entire teamates to report me. i havent said anything like "kill yourself %%%got" or say anything degrading to the individual players. i never go that far. i never tell anyone to go get cancer. i just only tell my teamates to stop dying... thats it. nothing derogatory like that
